Welcome to Valido App’s Session Recorder and say goodbye to complex testing frameworks!

With our Chrome extension, you get to record user sessions and use it to effortlessly create end-to-end user experience tests for your ecommerce. No more complicated test setups;  whether you're an online startup owner, QA tester, software developer, or digital marketer, Valido App simplifies the ecommerce  testing process, making it accessible to everyone.


𝐊𝐄𝐘 𝐅𝐄𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐄𝐒

🎥 Real User Session Recording:
Ever wondered how your customers truly experience your ecommerce platform? Just navigate through your website and Valido App captures all your interactions, allowing you to quickly generate User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) tests for your online store. 

🚀 Rapid, User-Friendly Test Creation:
Create user journey tests for your ecommerce in just minutes, all without writing a single line of code. Comprehensively test across different devices and locations. Valido App ensures a quick and intuitive test creation process, making regression testing a breeze.


𝐖𝐇𝐎 𝐂𝐀𝐍 𝐁𝐄𝐍𝐄𝐅𝐈𝐓
• Startups: Monitor your ecommerce store health and user experience effortlessly.
• Software Developers: Save time on manual testing before each release and accelerate deployment efforts.
• QA Testers: Automate your testing workflows with ease.
• Digital Marketer: Identify user frictions and optimize your conversion funnels.


𝐖𝐇𝐘 𝐂𝐇𝐎𝐎𝐒𝐄 𝐕𝐀𝐋𝐈𝐃𝐎 𝐀𝐏𝐏 𝐎𝐕𝐄𝐑 𝐎𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐑 𝐓𝐎𝐎𝐋𝐒?
• Start Testing in Minutes: No download or software installation necessary. Our cloud-based solution gets you up and running quickly.
• Low Cost: Explore Valido App with our free trial (link below). If you like what you see, Valido offers cost-effective and personalized plans based on your automated testing needs.
• Reliable: Valido App’s automated testing guarantees consistency and repeatability in test results, minimizing the chances of errors in execution.
• Works Out-of-the-Box: No complex configurations or setups.
• Codeless: No programming skills needed; Valido is simple to use and is designed to make ecommerce testing accessible to everyone, including you!
